The 'Assumption College of Davao' (ACD) is a private Catholic academic
institution in Davao City, Philippines. It was established in 1958 by the
Daughters of Mary of the Assumption or FMA. It is currently owned and managed by
the Missionaries of the Assumption (m.a.). It was formerly named the Assumption
School of Davao (ASD) and renamed Assumption College of Davao (ACD) in 1998 on
its 40th anniversary. The 50th Anniversary celebration was celebrated on August
2008, the school is widely known as the roots of quality transformative
education.
categories: Roman Catholic universities and colleges in the Philippines
